body_html:
@srossi93 Thanks. This is also what I used instead when I found out the problem.

Still it is unclear to me what torch.tensor intends to do with a Variable input other than just copy its data and create a new tensor ... In any case ignoring a given settings is a strange behavior that should be changed / clearly documented.

@srossi93 Thanks. This is also what I used instead when I found out the problem.
Still it is unclear to me what torch.tensor intends to do with a Variable input other than just copy its data and create a new tensor ... In any case ignoring a given settings is a strange behavior that should be changed / clearly documented.
body:
@srossi93 Thanks. This is also what I used instead when I found out the problem.

Still it is unclear to me what `torch.tensor` intends to do with a Variable input other than just copy its data and create a new tensor ... In any case ignoring a given settings is a strange behavior that should be changed / clearly documented.
